channel.title: [317] Client unable to connect? [317]
channel.description:
Hello.
A while back I made a webclient for my server following Halflingsblade's guide (http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,432152.0.html). I got it to work perfectly with downloading cache and connecting to server and what not. Then I stopped working with my server cause I had to focus more on my school work. Now I've started again and I somehow managed to corrupt my client so it didn't load properly. Instead of trying to find what was wrong and fix it, I just downloaded the clean client again and re-make my client.
This time however, it cannot connect to my server. It loads just fine and downloads cache and unpacks, but it can't connect to my server (Error connecting to Server, and no message to a connect attempt on my server cmd). This happens on my run.bat file as well, so jarring/singing isn't the problem. If I change the ip to localhost, it connects, but if I change it to my no-ip ip then it wont connect.
I have not a clue to why this is happening, but I'm sure someone knows how to fix this?
Thanks in advance :D

item.title: [317] Client unable to connect? [317]
item.dc:creator: @Praktikanten Praktikanten
item.description:
@Praktikanten wrote:

Thank you for replying.

EDIT: Thank you for pointing out that it might be the port that was the problem
I checked it out and the my rsps port was set to wrong ip, probably because router has been accidentally disconnected lol.
Thank you so much, would rep++ if you could

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Client unable to connect? [317]
item.dc:creator: @lord_fear lord_fear
item.description:
@lord_fear wrote:

Not really much to try
Change the port?
Make sure the ip is working?

Read full topic
